00003 import roomClassifier
00004 import roomArea
00005 import sharedWalls
00006 
00007 def decodePlan(room_list):
00008 
00009     rooms, roomDesc, roomSizes = [],[],[]
00010     roomarea, roomlist = [],[]
00011     
00012     # call the room-classification routine
00013     rooms = roomClassifier.f1(room_list)
00014     roomNum = rooms[-1:]
00015     rooms = rooms[:-1]
00016 
00017     numRoom = 0
00018 
00019     for k in xrange(0,len(rooms)/2):
00020         roomDesc.append(rooms[2*k])
00021         roomSizes.append(rooms[2*k+1])
00022 
00023     for k in xrange(len(roomDesc)):
00024         if roomDesc[k] != 'S':
00025             numRoom = numRoom + 1
00026 
00027     # call the area calculation routine
00028     roomarea = roomArea.f1(roomDesc,roomSizes)
00029     # call the adjoining-room calculation routine 
00030     roomlist = sharedWalls.f1(roomNum,roomDesc,roomSizes)
00031 
00032     return [numRoom, roomarea, roomlist, roomDesc, roomSizes]
